Initializer# init(allowsTickValuesOnly:neutralValue:enabledRange:ticks:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalystvisionOS 26.0+

```
init(
    allowsTickValuesOnly: Bool = true,
    neutralValue: Float = 0,
    enabledRange: ClosedRange<Float> = 0...1,
    ticks: [UISlider.TrackConfiguration.Tick]
)
```
